features.description: Create one-page pitch document for general contractors explaining white-label scanning partnership opportunity. Cover: their markup/margin opportunity, our reliability specs and SLAs, referral fee structure, case study proof point, and clear next steps. Professional but direct tone.

Create blog post with downloadable calculator showing cost of field measurement errors vs. scanning investment. Include: industry stats on change order frequency/cost, real ROI timeline examples, comparison scenarios (manual vs. scan), and clear CTA. Technical expert voice.

Create outreach package for local AIA chapter speaking/demo opportunities. Include: email template (educational positioning, not sales), list of 5 target AIA chapters in our market, 3 talk title options with descriptions, and follow-up sequence. Goal: book 2 speaking slots in Q1.

completedFeatures.description: Create detailed case study showing ROI from recent preservation project. Include before/after deliverables, time savings metrics, and client testimonial.
Create and schedule 4 LinkedIn posts: 1 technical deep-dive, 1 project showcase, 1 industry insight, 1 engagement post. Use technical expert voice.
Create email sequence (3 emails) targeting architects at firms with renovation projects. Include value prop focused on preventing change orders.
Write technical blog post explaining point cloud to BIM workflow. Include screenshots, accuracy specs, and comparison to traditional methods.
Update proposal template with new 12-Point Reliability Standard messaging. Add variance control specs and depositioning vs Matterport.

Create 3-email follow-up sequence for stalled quotes. Include urgency triggers, objection pre-handling, and limited-time incentive option. Add personalization fields for project name, quote amount, and original conversation points.

completedFeatures.task: Architect Firm Hit List - Northeast Corridor
completedFeatures.description: Research and compile list of 25 architecture firms in DC-to-Boston corridor with active renovation or historic preservation projects. Include: firm name, website, key contact (name/title/LinkedIn), recent relevant project, and specific outreach angle based on their work.
